scripts.installglobals: npm i -g bower gulp cordova ionic tsd@next karma-cli protractor node-gyp coffee-script js-beautify typescript npm-check parse-dashboard mongodb-runner playup json browser-sync@2.12.12
scripts.deploy-qa: cp app-qa.yaml app.yaml && gcloud preview app deploy --stop-previous-version --project $(json -f config.json qa.gcpProjectId)
scripts.deploy-prod: cp app-prod.yaml app.yaml && gcloud preview app deploy --stop-previous-version --project $(json -f config.json prod.gcpProjectId)
scripts.dashboard-dev: parse-dashboard --serverURL "$(json -f config.json dev.serverUrl)$(json -f config.json parseMount)" --appId $(json -f config.json appId) --masterKey $(json -f config.json masterKey)
scripts.dashboard-qa: parse-dashboard --serverURL "$(json -f config.json qa.serverUrl)$(json -f config.json parseMount)" --appId $(json -f config.json appId) --masterKey $(json -f config.json masterKey)
scripts.dashboard-prod: parse-dashboard --serverURL "$(json -f config.json prod.serverUrl)$(json -f config.json parseMount)" --appId $(json -f config.json appId) --masterKey $(json -f config.json masterKey)
